sn22.33:4.3: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn22.33:4.5: Form isn’t yours: give it up.
sn22.33:4.6: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn22.33:4.12: consciousness isn’t yours: give it up.
sn22.33:4.13: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn22.33:5.1: Suppose a person was to carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in this Jeta’s Grove, or burn them, or do what they want with them.
sn22.33:5.3: ‘This person is carrying us off, burning us, or doing what they want with us?’”
sn22.33:5.6: Because that’s neither self nor belonging to self.”
sn22.33:5.7: “In the same way, mendicants, form isn’t yours: give it up.
sn22.33:5.8: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn22.33:5.13: consciousness isn’t yours: give it up.
sn22.33:5.14: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.”
